task.title: Viewing LTPA profiles by using the command line
task.shortdesc: System administrators can view LTPA profiles by using the list LTPAProfile, and show LTPAProfile commands on the command line.

context.p: You can view LTPA profiles by using the command line, or by using the . For more information about using the to view LTPA profiles, see .

step.cmd: To view all LTPA profiles, enter the following command:
To view a specific LTPA profile, enter the following command:
step.info:
show LTPAProfile "Name=name"Where:
name Specifies the name of the LTPA profile that you want to view.
